parsed.plot: DEV: Rance and Talia consummated their bond—her first sexual experience, intense and degrading as she desired; he displayed untrained Mage-Gift (telekinesis on door/curtains, raw channels still painful); she discovered arousal from submission/degradation tied to Holderkin upbringing; both now face meeting Selenay with their relationship fundamentally altered. PEND: Meeting with Queen Selenay in under two candlemarks; presenting their co-advisor arrangement while concealing new intimate dimension; Talia must clean up physical evidence; managing their unprecedented bond's political/personal complexity.

entities.c: IDENTITY: Lost virginity to Rance—physical evidence (bite mark on breast, soreness, his seed inside her) will be hidden beneath Whites when meeting Selenay. STATE: Discovered she's aroused by degradation/submission—specifically being called 'Holderkin bitch/slut,' treated as vessel/property; conflicts with Queen's Own dignity but provides profound release from responsibility. Holderkin upbringing vocabulary enables her degradation fantasies. Two intense orgasms; first time experiencing this loss of control. Post-coital clarity returning but fundamentally changed. STANCE-Rance: Completely claimed physically and emotionally; surrendered control she's maintained for years; grateful for permission to set duty aside; their relationship now explicitly sexual with dominant/submissive dynamic she craves; trusts him to handle complications. Ready to present co-advisor arrangement to Selenay while concealing intimate dimension.

STATE: Maintained physical distance during coupling but couldn't fully shield from bond—experienced intensity of both participants' emotions despite discomfort. Witnessed Talia's complete transformation and surrender. STANCE-Rance: Resigned acceptance of complications; concerned about untrained Mage-Gift use (door slam, curtain closure via telekinesis); pragmatic about time constraints and upcoming royal meeting. Mix of understanding their need and worry about unprecedented situation. STANCE-Talia: Surprised by Talia's response to dominance/degradation; recognizes this surrender provides release from constant responsibility.

Displayed untrained telekinesis—slammed door and closed curtains with more force than intended; channels described as 'burned open' and 'raw around edges,' causing pain when used; dangerous when uncontrolled (Talia noted could level building). Requires formal training to prevent accidents.
